# vue-tsc

`vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build`

Vue 3 command line Type-Checking tool base on IDE plugin [Volar](https://github.com/johnsoncodehk/volar).

## Versions

| vue-tsc | TypeScript | Volar                                                                                                    |
|---------|------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 0.0.24  | 4.2.3      | 0.24.0                                                                                                   |

| 0.0.22  | 4.2.3      | 0.23.7                                                                                                   |
